name: Nancy Lee Bentley

jv_history.source_quote: Sponsored by the Food Studies Program at The New School | http://www.news

what_you_do: Nancy Lee Bentley is a visionary wholistic nourishment expert, speaker, and best-selling author.
who_you_serve: Conscious women leaders and changemakers, people on a health journey, communities ready to move from 'Me to We'.
seeking: Nancy is looking to convene Circle-of-Three leadership teams and collaborative communities ready to seed this new paradigm together.
offering: Nancy serves as a vision carrier and wayshower, offering connective talks, cultivating classes, and community circles.
signature_programs: Nancy's signature work includes 'The Food Circle®', a visionary metasystem and blueprint for reconnecting people around food, nourishment, and shared purpose.
business_focus: Nancy's work is about remembering who we are, what truly sustains life, and how food, community, and consciousness are inseparable.
service_provided: Connective talks, cultivating classes, community circles
